committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide that certain lands shall be in trust for the Pechanga Band of Luiseno Mission Indians of the Pechanga Reservation, California.

summary.text: Provides that the United States' interest in specified lands shall be held in trust for the benefit of the Pechanga Band of Luiseno Mission Indians of California as part of the Pechanga Indian Reservation.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain lands shall be in trust for the Pechanga Band of Luiseno Mission Indians of the Pechanga Reservation, California.
